channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report I-2024090028
item.description:
Report I-2024090028

  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.

item.title: Report X-2024091132
item.description:
Report X-2024091132

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-22T09:13:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-20
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 8/20/2024 at approximately 18:15 during x-ray screening of shipment 027-34159506, in 1 out of the 2 totes there was three cans that resembled aerosol cans, showing the concave bottoms of the cans. Upon doing a targeted physical search three cans of Sprayway aerosol glass cleaner was discovered. 3 X 23 ounce cans
